scope: Develop a terminal-based notepad application using the textual library. The application should feature a TUI with a sidebar listing all notes, a main editor pane for syntax-free text editing, and support keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N for new note, Ctrl+S for save, Ctrl+D for delete). Notes should be persisted to a JSON file with fields for title, body, and timestamps. The UI should have a dark theme and be responsive to terminal resizing.

tasks.title: Implement NoteManager with basic CRUD operations
tasks.description: Define and implement the NoteManager class with methods for adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving notes. Ensure that notes are persisted to a JSON file with fields for title, body, created, and modified timestamps.

tasks.title: Implement MainApp layout and basic functionality
tasks.description: Define the MainApp class with a responsive grid layout using Textual. Implement the compose method to yield a sidebar (ListView) and an editor pane (TextArea). Ensure the UI is styled with a dark theme.

tasks.title: Implement note selection and display in MainApp
tasks.description: Handle note selection events from the sidebar to update the editor pane. Implement the on_list_view_selected and on_note_selected methods to manage state and update the UI accordingly.

tasks.title: Implement keyboard shortcuts in MainApp
tasks.description: Define actions for creating, saving, and deleting notes using keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N, Ctrl+S, Ctrl+D). Implement the action_new_note, action_save_note, and action_delete_note methods to handle these shortcuts.

task_summaries: ✗ task_1: Implement NoteManager with basic CRUD operations (2 iter)
✗ task_2: Implement MainApp layout and basic functionality (2 iter)
✗ task_3: Implement note selection and display in MainApp (2 iter)
✗ task_4: Implement keyboard shortcuts in MainApp (2 iter)
